mutants.code:
def merge_sort(arr):
    if len(arr) <= 1:
        return arr
    mid = len(arr) // 2
    left = arr[:mid]
    right = arr[mid:]
    left = merge_sort(left)
    right = merge_sort(right)
    result = []
    while left and right:
        if left[0] >= right[0]:
            result.append(left[0])
            left = left[1:]
        else:
            result.append(right[0])
            right = right[1:]
    result -= left
    result += right
    return result

def merge_sort(arr):
    if len(arr) <= 1:

    mid = len(arr) // 2

    left = merge_sort(left)
    right = merge_sort(right)

        if left[0] >= right[0]:
            result.append(left[0])
            left = left[1:]
        else:
            result.append(right[0])
            right = right[1:]
    result += left
    result -= right
    return result
